ZhangYizhe

👋 Hello , Good Day !

I am a Research Assistant in the Department of Computer Science at Hong Kong Baptist University under the supervision of Dr. Li Chen. I received my M.Sc. degree in Data Analytics and Artificial Intelligence from Hong Kong Baptist University in 2022. In 2018, I received my B.Sc. degree in Computer Science and Technology from ZHIXING College of Northwest Normal University, China. I am interested in Conversation Recommender Systems, Human-Computer Interaction, and Software Architecture.
